name: MICROGEIST
description:
Some time in some year, a doctor discovers that single celled organisms can come back as ghosts....

----------

My submission to the low res game jam!! This game is only 64x64 pixels big. Well, the window is bigger, but the game itself is inside the window! 

If it is hard to see, open config_ph3sx and you can choose a new window size. I recommend 1280 x 960 for max enjoyment 

This game has no lives, but your score will reset to 0 if you're hit. Try to get a perfect score!

This game features:

-Two original tracks, made by the talented and quick Maxim Grachev 

-A character manual, containing pictures of the cells I and my friends designed for the game!

-A neat little story, not much but I hope you enjoy it

This was a blast to make.  Support the other entries here!: https://itch.io/jam/lowrezjam-2021/entries

----------

Music names:

Stage theme: Unseen battle

Boss theme: Alpha Disease 

Ending theme: A very slowed down version of Tsubakisou by Yoeko Kurahashi
